name: Villa Giuliana B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Villa Giuliana for 7 days in May and toured Salento from there with the car. The Villa is strategically positioned to get anywhere you want to in Puglia and the evenings in Lecce where geourgous! The road from the villa takes you into Lecce in 10min.
reviews.title: Great times at Villa Giuliana B&B

reviews.text: The rooms were always very clean, which we appreciated and the breakfast was fabulous!
reviews.title: Beautiful Oasis in Southern Puglia
Excellent Choice!
reviews.text: Andrea and his mother made our stay even more special with their great company! We will miss the breakfast on the terrasse together with them! We will return to this place the next time we travel to Puglia! See you then, Andrea!

reviews.title: A lovely break in Puglia
reviews.text: We live in Northern Italy and took our parents on a tour of Puglia. We stayed at the Villa Giulliana B&B in Lecce for three nights. The rooms were very well done and modern with AC (if you need it). The grounds of the B&B are like an amazing garden. Our parents were so impressed we had picked a place just outside of Lecce that was like an oasis. We had a nice breakfast each morning overlooking the gorgeous garden. True vacation...Andrea the proprietor was so helpful, he helped us make the most of our trip. He recommeneded beaches, restaurants and great driving tours. My wife and I will go back for a gettaway weekend. Make sure you have a car, you'll want one anyway to see all the great coastline around southern Lecce. B&B is about 5 minutes outside of central Lecce.

My husband and I stayed at the Villa Giuliana B&B for two weeks during the Fall of 2006. We had a great time. The lush gardens filled with olive and fruit trees made our morning breakfast that much more enjoyable. We arrived as strangers and left as friends. Our room was comfortable and the food was delicious. The Villa Giuliana B&B's affordability and the owner's English speaking skills makes this an excellent choice for any American traveling abroad.
reviews.title: Like Staying with Friends

reviews.text: We spent one week in this beautiful b&b, enjoying the calm of its garden, the friendly and welcoming attitude of the owners (Andrea and Giuliana), the fabulous smell and taste of homemade pastry cooked by Giuliana for breakfast and discovering many interesting places: the elegant city of Lecce with Baroque buildings, the oriental and fascinating Otranto, S. Maria di Leuca, the beautiful Ionio see. We higlhy recommend Villa Giuliana to anybody for the peaceful location, for its welcoming rooms, for fresh fruits you can pick up from the many trees in the garden, for quality vineries and restaurants nearby. It has been a relaxing and peasant holiday; we enjoyed beeing spoiled by the great cook Giuliana and appreciated the friendly suggestions of her son Andrea. We often go abroad on holiday, but we will definitely come back to Villa Giuliana, in this special corner of Italy called Salento.
reviews.title: A place to come back
I can not speak more highly...
reviews.text: Maddalena and Paolo from Reggio Emilia, Italy

aka: Villa Giuliana B&B Province Of Lecce/Arnesano, Italy
description: Only 4 km from the baroque city centre of Lecce and 17 km from Porto Cesareo, fast and easy drive. All our 6 rooms, double, triple and quadruple, have their own bathroom, are air conditioned, have private car park facilities and are surrounded by an acre of garden and olive groves. You can now reach Villa Giuliana flying to Brindisi, only 40 minutes away from us You will need a car to get around and this is not a problem. You can rent a car and pick it up on arrival at the Airport.
